subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Kelly Shoppach hit a pinch-hit three-run homer last night to complete a five-run ninth-inning rally that gave the host Cleveland Indians an 8-5 victory against the Oakland Athletics.
snippet: Kelly Shoppach hit a pinch-hit three-run homer last night to complete a five-run ninth-inning rally that gave the host Cleveland Indians an 8-5 victory against the Oakland Athletics.
